PreparerFirmName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: TYLER SIMMS & ST SAUVEUR CPA PC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROMOTE LITERATURE, SCIENCE & USEFUL ARTS EDUCATION TO STUDENTS IN GRADES 9 THROUGH PG
IRS990.MissionDesc: NEW HAMPTON SCHOOL CULTIVATES LIFELONG LEARNERS WHO WILL SERVE AS ACTIVE GLOBAL CITIZENS. NEW HAMPTON SCHOOL PROMOTES LITERATURE, SCIENCE & USEFUL ARTS EDUCATION TO STUDENTS IN GRADES 9 THROUGH PG
IRS990.Desc: A HIGH-QUALITY, FOUR-YEAR CO-EDUCATIONAL SECONDARY LEVEL OF EDUCATION FOR RESIDENTIAL AND DAY STUDENTS, CURRENTLY SERVING A STUDENT BODY OF APPROXIMATELY 320.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO SUPPORT THE SPENDING POLICY OF LONG-TERM INVESTMENT RETURNS. THE ANNUAL CALCULATED AMOUNT IS USED TO SUPPLEMENT THE FISCAL OPERATIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

THE SCHOOL HAS ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION SUBTOPIC 740-10, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. SUBTOPIC 740-10 ADDRESSES THE ACCOUNTING UNCERTAINTY OF INCOME TAXES RECOGNIZED IN AN ENTERPRISE'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND PRESCRIBES A THRESHOLD OF "MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT" FOR RECOGNITION AND DERECOGNITION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. SUBTOPIC 740-10 ALSO PROVIDES GUIDANCE ON MEASUREMENT CLASSIFICATION, INTEREST AND PENALTIES AND DISCLOSURE. THE SCHOOL HAS DETERMINED THAT THE PROVISIONS OF SUBTOPIC 740-10 DO NOT HAVE A MATERIAL EFFECT ON THE SCHOOL'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
FINANCIAL AID -4,251,625. LIFE INSURANCE PREMIUMS -264,035. INTEREST RATE SWAP -214,805. PROVISION FOR BAD DEBT -420,000. ROUNDING 1.
FINANCIAL AID 4,251,625. LIFE INSURANCE PREMIUMS 264,035. PROVISION FOR BAD DEBT 420,000. ROUNDING 1.
COMMUNICATION WITH NEW STUDENTS REGARDING NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY. THIS INFORMATION IS ALSO INCLUDED IN PROMOTIONAL & ADMISSION MATERIAL AND THROUGH NEWSPAPER ADVERTISEMENTS.
THE ORGANIZATION IMMEDIATELY APPLIES THE NEED-BASED GRANT AWARD TO THE TUITION BALANCE. THE NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF THE RECIPIENTS ARE AVAILABLE AT THE NEW HAMPTON SCHOOL.
A CAMPUS RESIDENCE, OWNED BY NEW HAMPTON SCHOOL, WAS PROVIDED FOR PERSONAL USE AS A CONDITION OF EMPLOYMENT TO THE HEAD OF SCHOOL.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: CAP PROJECT & PARTIAL REFUND OF 10/01/10 ISSUE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WHEN DONORS TRANSFER STOCK INTO THE NEW HAMPTON SCHOOL UBS ACCOUNT, IT IS SOLD IMMEDIATELY. UBS FINANCIAL SERVICES, INC. 1 STATE STREET SUITE 1600 HARTFORD, CT 06103-3102

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S 990 FORM, PRIOR TO FILING, IS MADE AVAILABLE AT THE SCHEDULED TRUSTEE MEETING(WITH ADDITIONAL COPIES AVAILABLE TO ALL TRUSTEES).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH TRUSTEE, OFFICER, AND COMMITTEE MEMBER, UPON ENTERING THE DUTIES OF HIS/HER OFFICE AND ANNUALLY THEREAFTER, WILL BE ADVISED OF THIS POLICY AND SHALL SIGN A STATEMENT ACKNOWLEDGING UNDERSTANDING OF AND AGREEMENT TO THIS POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S KEY EMPLOYEE INCLUDES THE USE OF PEER EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS SALARY SURVEY INFORMATION, CONSULTATION WITH A LABOR MATTERS LEGAL FIRM, AND THE PREPARATION OF A THREE-YEAR EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT THAT IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THE COMPENSATION TASK FORCE REVIEWS ALL ISANNE SALARY DATA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, & FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
